verses.verse: The Lord <WH3068> showed <WH7200> me <WH8147>, and, behold, two baskets <WH1736> of figs <WH8384> were set <WH3259> before <WH6440> the temple <WH1964> of the Lord <WH3068>, after <WH310> that Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> had carried away captive <WH1540> Jeconiah <WH3204> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiakim <WH3079> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, and the princes <WH8269> of Judah <WH3063>, with the carpenters <WH2796> and smiths <WH4525>, from Jerusalem <WH3389>, and had brought <WH935> them to Babylon <WH894>.

One <WH259> basket <WH1731> had very <WH3966> good <WH2896> figs <WH8384>, even like the figs <WH8384> that are first ripe <WH1073>: and the other <WH259> basket <WH1731> had very <WH3966> naughty <WH7451> figs <WH8384>, which could not be eaten <WH398>, they were so bad <WH7455>.

Then said <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> unto me <WH7200>, What see you <WH3414>, Jeremiah? And I said <WH559>, Figs <WH8384>; the good <WH2896> figs <WH8384>, very <WH3966> good <WH2896>; and the evil <WH7451>, very <WH3966> evil <WH7451>, that cannot be eaten <WH398>, they are so evil <WH7455>.
Again the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; Like these good <WH2896> figs <WH8384>, so will I acknowledge <WH5234> them that are carried away captive <WH1546> of Judah <WH3063>, whom I have sent <WH7971> out of this place <WH4725> into the land <WH776> of the Chaldeans <WH3778> for their good <WH2896>.

For I will set <WH7760> my eyes <WH5869> upon them for good <WH2896>, and I will bring them again <WH7725> to this land <WH776>: and I will build <WH1129> them <WH2040>, and not pull them down; and I will plant <WH5193> them <WH5428>, and not pluck them up.

And I will give <WH5414> them a heart <WH3820> to know <WH3045> me <WH3068>, that I am the Lord: and they shall be my people <WH5971>, and I will be their God <WH430>: for they shall return <WH7725> unto me with their whole heart <WH3820>.

And as the evil <WH7451> figs <WH8384>, which cannot be eaten <WH398>, they are so evil <WH7455>; surely thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>, So will I give <WH5414> Zedekiah <WH6667> the king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, and his princes <WH8269>, and the residue <WH7611> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, that remain <WH7604> in this land <WH776>, and them that live <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>:

And I will deliver <WH5414> them to be removed <WH2189> into all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776> for their hurt <WH7451>, to be a reproach <WH2781> and a proverb <WH4912>, a taunt <WH8148> and a curse <WH7045>, in all places <WH4725> where I shall drive them <WH5080>.

And I will send <WH7971> the sword <WH2719>, the famine <WH7458>, and the pestilence <WH1698>, among them <WH8552>, until they be consumed from off the land <WH127> that I gave <WH5414> unto them and to their fathers <WH1>.
